short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filter the "TFT Meta Team Comps Tier List" based on item components

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a way to filter out the team comps on tftactics.gg based on the item components you get in-game

*Not affiliated with tftactics.gg at all, this is just a personal little project
